benchmark_details.name: InPlan3D
benchmark_details.overview: InPlan3D is a comprehensive benchmark for 3D task planning, consisting of 3,174 long-term planning tasks across 636 indoor scenes, designed to evaluate the reasoning capabilities of large language models in 3D environments.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the reasoning capabilities of large language models for task planning in indoor 3D scenes.

data.source: Curated from 636 indoor scenes with various task scenarios.
data.annotation: Manually created task descriptions with high-level instructions and detailed action steps.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on task completion success and reasoning accuracy.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better reasoning capabilities and task completion accuracy.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated against existing state-of-the-art methods.
